title: The defence of death Contayning a moste excellent discourse of life and death, vvritten in Frenche by Philip de Mornaye Gentleman. And doone into English by E.A.
author: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Iohn Allde for Edward Aggas dwelling in Paules Churchyarde at the signe of the red Dragon,
